description: Numbers n such that n^2 + (n+1)^2 + (n+2)^2 + (n+3)^2 + (n+4)^2 + (n+5)^2 is prime.
comments: Numbers n such that 55 + 30n + 6n^2 is prime. - _Zak Seidov_, May 20 2014
links: Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Select[Range[6!], PrimeQ[#^2 + (# + 1)^2 + (# + 2)^2 + (# + 3)^2 + (# + 4)^2 + (# + 5)^2] &] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 20 2009 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
